attributes.action: Close the U-Turns on the A249 Sittingbourne kent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want these U-Turns closed and roundabouts put in as my father was killed on this extremly busy road in 2007 as a direct result of foreign lorry's carrying out illegal U-Turns. This road is busy all the time and many people are traveling at least 80mph whilst other people are trying to cross using U-Turns and risking there life's.
many people have been killed on this road some because of the U-Turns and I want something done now before anybody else loses there life.
Kent County Council say the roundabouts are going to cost 3 Million to put in place and that they do not have the money to do it.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the relevant local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
